TopicTitle: Trying to look inside fairings visual glitch

Articles.Content:
This seems to happen with every single build that I've done using the procedural fairings.

Once they are completed when I try to hover over the payload to look inside the side that opens up glitches back and forth rapidly instead of just staying open.

Running Windows 11 from Steam with version 0.1.0
This has been fixed as of v0.1.3.
